episodes.title: (D)Mit 9 einen Vertrag für Scientology unterschrieben -- Geschichtsstunde von einem Sektenkind (D)
episodes.description:
Ich bin als Scientology Kind aufgewachsen und als ich 9 Jahre alt war, wurde ch dazu gebracht einen Vertrag zu unterschreiben für eine Milliarden Jahre.
Mit diesem Vertrag solle ich den Rest meines Leben und jegliche zukünftige Leben für Scientology arbeiten.
Hier erzähle ich über diese Ereignis und was danach geschah.

Bitte gebt dem Video einen Daumen hoch und abonniert doch meinem Kanal.
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnF_3vyNRUzyw-uftBQ5wvA?sub_confirmation=1

Falls man mich direkt kontaktieren möchte, dann schreibt mir doch bitte eine E-mail an:
thespchef@gmail.com

episodes.title: At 9 years old signing a Billion year contract -- Story time with Samuel the SP Chef
episodes.description:
I grew up as a Scientology child, my parents where staff members at the Scientology Organisation in Basel, Switzerland and when I was nine years old, I signed a billion year contract to join the Sea Org.
And this is the story.

Please give this video a thumbs up and consider subscribing to my channel.
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnF_3vyNRUzyw-uftBQ5wvA?sub_confirmation=1

If you'd like to get in touch with me directly, then please write me at

episodes.title: Interview with Jeff from @ptsforlife
episodes.description:
Jeff grew up in Scientology and is now speaking out, protesting and sharing his journey.
Back in December 2023 I did a three part Interview on his channel, which was my first time telling my story publicly. Now I am delighted to have him on my channel to talk about his experience and how it feels to protest something, that he was part of for so many years.

If you'd like to get in touch with me directly, then please write me at
thespchef@gmail.com

Make sure to also check out Jeff's channel if indeed you are not subscribed yet:
https://www.youtube.com/@ptsforlife

Please consider liking this video and subscribing to my channel:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnF_3vyNRUzyw-uftBQ5wvA?sub_confirmation=1

episodes.title: Live cooking and Q&A
episodes.description:
I will be making a desert, that I used to make when I was working as a Cadet for Scientology. As a Cadet, the only way to make money and give ourselfs a weekly pay, was by doing the laundry for Sea Org members and by making cakes, muffins and other desserts to then sell to the Sea Org members.

Today I will make a so called Fridge-cake. It is a simple recipe that uses some melted chocolate and left overs from your cupboard like nuts,dried fruits, cookies and such.
I will be using 400g/14oz of melted chocolate
And a dish with the capacity of about 800ml/28oz
For the other ingredients you may choose yourself the amount and what 
you want to put in it.
But it is important, that you do not add too much, otherwise the ´´cake`` will fall apart.

While I am preparing it, you may ask me any question that I will be answering during my preparation of the dessert and after it.

episodes.title: No soggy Bottom in my Kitchen, thank you very much! 👨‍🍳😉 #baking  #exscientologist #sptv
Mary Berry is my Queen! #scientology #exscientologist #sptv #baking
Mary Berry is my queen
episodes.description:
Watch the full video and baking tutorial for persuasion cookies:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pccoZlJs0Fc&t=474s

episodes.title: Suppressive cooking -- The persuasion cookies
episodes.description:
During my time in the Sea Org, working in Scientology I was stationed at the Stables in St. Hill, England (from 2008-2012). There I ran the staff canteen and eventually worked fully in the kitchen cooking the food for the staff.
The statistics to determine weather you cooked well was decided on a simple point system that each Sea Org member would have to fill out to show their satisfaction with the food. Then at the end of the week it would be counted all together and that determined the statistic of the staff cook.
Naturally, many people ended up not voting as they just couldn't be bothered with it. So I came up with the idea of gently persuading them to do so, by bribing them with cookies. And here I show you how I made the persuasion cookies.

These are the Ingredients that you will need to make between 18-20 cookies:
175g/6oz of soft margarine
225g/8oz of caster sugar
2 medium eggs
350g/12oz of either self-raising flour, or 350g/12oz of regular flour with 1/2 teaspoon of baking powder.
50g/2oz of chocolate chips
20g/1oz of oats
30g/1.5oz of walnuts

Please make sure to preheat your oven to 180'C/350'F and bake the cookies for 15-20 minutes.


Here you can find the Interview that Jeff did with me:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0L3MgHAFD4Q&t=7111s

If you'd like to get in touch with me directly, then please write me at
thespchef@gmail.com

episodes.title: No soggy bottoms! Suppressive cooking -- Tiramisu pat 2
episodes.description:
Here you can see the great result after letting the tiramisu rest for the night in combination with the proper dipping method for the Italian finger-bisquits.
Thus no soggy bottom!

Do watch the full cooking tutorial for the Tiramisu here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PlkqpycINyY

If you'd like to get in touch with me directly, then please write me at
thespchef@gmail.com

episodes.title: Suppressive cooking -- Tiramisu
episodes.description:
Today I will be doing some chefing.
While I was working for Scientology in the Sea Org (2005-2012) I was stationed at the Stables in St. Hill East Grinstead, England where the staff canteen and the kitchens for the staff food was made and served.
For Valentines-day 2009 a cook (that shortly after left the Sea Org with his wife) made Tiramisu and this recipe is from his own grandmother who was Sicilian. This very recipe I will show you how to make.

You will need:
4 medium Eggs, separated
500g / 17.6oz of mascarpone
140g / 4.9oz of sugar (the original recipe requires 180g / 6.3oz)
24 Italiens finger--bisquits
500ml/ 17.6oz espresso
some raw, unsweetened cocoa powder
a sprinkle of suppression (salt)

This recipe will make about two dishes with each holding 800ml/ 28.2oz

Hope you enjoy and let me know how you did with it.

If you'd like to get in touch with me directly, then please write me at
thespchef@gmail.com

episodes.title: Dating in Scientology's Sea Org
episodes.description:
In this video I describe dating within Scientology's Sea Org, needless to say it is not much fun. I talk about the difficulties of finding time to get to know each other, who you are aloud to date and how far you are permitted to go before marriage.

If you'd like to get in touch with me directly, then please write me at:
thespchef@gmail.com

episodes.title: My experience with a Scientology auditing session as a child -- Story time with Samuel the SP Chef
episodes.description:
This is en extract from a longer video that I did. In this part I talk about the time when I was eleven or twelve and was audited by a man doing the TRs & Objectives Course (renamed and republished as The Survival Rundown).
Needless to say as it so often is when a child is involved in a Scientology session, it did not go well and was very traumatizing for me.

If you'd like to get in touch with me directly, then please write me at
thespchef@gmail.com

episodes.title: Scientology's TRs and Objectives
episodes.description:
Here I explain the course TRs and Objectives, although I focus more on the TRs (Training Routines) which is one of the many steps of Scientologys Bridge to total Freedom. 
I also talk about my own experience with this kind of auditing as a child and how that bad experience has effected my childhood and life after it.

If you'd like to get in touch with me directly, then please write me at

New info that I have received from my subscribers: TRs and objectives is now called ´´Survival Rundown``

episodes.title: The Scientology Cadet Organisation UK -- Story time with Samuel the SP Chef
episodes.description:
From 2005 - 2008 I was in the Sea Org Cadet Org and attended the Walsh manor School. Here I talk about my schedule, the kind of work that I did and my education from the age of 13 - 16.
I was there when in 2007 there was an inspection of the school and I look at the subsequent report of that inspection.




If you want to read the full report of the inspection, you will find it here.
Walsh Manor School inspection Report:

https://files.ofsted.gov.uk/v1/file/865557

episodes.title: Update on my Disconnection part 2
episodes.description:
My Sister and brother in law send me a Knowledge Report and after confronting him about it, they disconnected from me and blocked my phone Number.
I now have tried to actually ´´handle`` my problem with Scientology and after many phone calls I was advised to write a letter... and so I did.
let's see how long it will take them to respond.

If you'd like to get in tough with me directly, then please write me at
thespchef@gmail.com

episodes.title: Update on my Disconnection Part 1
episodes.description:

episodes.title: (D) Scientology Schulen in der Schweiz -- Geschichtsstunde von einem Sektenkind (D)
episodes.description:
Ich erzähle über meine Schulzeit von 2003 bis 2005 (Alter: 11 bis 13) wo ich zwei Scientology Schulen in der Schweiz besuchte. Die Privatschule Sandra Planzer, die auch in 2003 geschlossen worden ist wegen ihre Scientology Methoden im Unterricht und die ZIEL Schule in Zürich, die heute immer noch offen ist und Schüler unterrichtet.

Hier den Artikel von dem Beobachter:
https://www.beobachter.ch/gesetze-recht/scientology-urteil-macht-nicht-schule-11505

Falls ihr mich direkt kontaktieren möchte, dann schreibt mir doch bitte eine E-mail an:
thespchef@gmail.com

episodes.title: (D) Ich bin ein Sektenkind von Scientology (D)
episodes.description:
Ich erzähle meine Geschichte als Scientology Sektenkind, wie ich mit neun Jahren einen Vertrag unterschrieben habe um für den Rest meines Leben und für die nächsten Milliarden Jahre für Scientology zu arbeiten.
Wie ich dann mit 13 nach England gebracht worden bin um dort meine Pflichten des Vertrags war zu nehmen.
Ich erzähle über meine Schwierigkeiten als schwuler Mann in dieser Sekte zu sein und meine versuche ´´mein Leben zu löschen`` durch den enormen Selbsthass den ich für mich hatte. über meine Zeit, nachdem ich die Scientology Arbeit verliess in 2012 und wie ich nach fünf Jahren endlich aus meiner eigenen Gehirnwäscherei in 2017 komplett kam und ich mich als Ex-Scientologen beschreiben konnte.

Falls ihr mich direkt kontaktieren möchte, dann schreibt mir doch bitte eine E-mail an:
thespchef@gmail.com

episodes.title: The greater good in Scientology
episodes.description:
What is the greater good in Scientology and what are the eight dynamics of life and how are they used to justify the behavior of Scientology and Scientologists?
I'm having a brief look at that, my own understanding and experience as an Ex Scientologist myself.

If you'd like to get in tough with me directly, then please write me at
thespchef@gmail.com

episodes.title: Interview with Ex Scientologist Samuel Zülli aka The SP Chef  Part 3
episodes.description:
The third and final part of a three part Interview looking at my life growing up in Scientology, signing a billion-year contract at nine years old, being trafficked from Switzerland to England at 13, then joining the Sea Org. My ´´career`` in the Sea Org, the struggles of working for Scientology as a gay man and leaving the Sea Org at 20 and finding my way in life after Scientology. We talk about my mental health and the struggles of life with a Scientology background.
the interview was hosted by the marvelous Jeff from the YouTube channel @ptsforlife back in December 2023

If you want to get in touch with me directly, then please write me at: thespchef@gmail.com

My art on Instagram for the curious amongst you: https://www.instagram.com/kunstatelier_zuellimann/
